statements: SELECT * FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000
SELECT donation_id, donor_name FROM donations WHERE donor_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations ORDER BY donation_amount DESC
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT donation_id, donor_name, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donor_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY donation_date ASC
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT donor_name, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donations FROM donations GROUP BY donor_name HAVING total_donations > 5000 ORDER BY donor_name
SELECT * FROM donations ORDER BY donation_id DESC, donor_name ASC
SELECT * FROM donation_records WHERE donation_amount > 100
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donation_records WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity < 100 ORDER BY expiration_date ASC
SELECT supply_name, quantity, supplier FROM medical_supplies WHERE supply_name LIKE 'Bandages%'
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donation_records ORDER BY donation_amount DESC, donation_date ASC
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donation_records WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT supply_name, quantity, supplier FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity < 100 ORDER BY supplier ASC;
SELECT id, donor_name, donation_date FROM donation_records WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT donation_records.donor_name, medical_supplies.supply_name FROM donation_records INNER JOIN medical_supplies ON donation_records.id = medical_supplies.supply_id;
SELECT donor_name, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donation FROM donation_records GROUP BY donor_name HAVING total_donation > 5000 ORDER BY total_donation DESC;
SELECT * FROM donations;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 100;
SELECT donation_id, donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT center_name, center_location FROM distribution_centers WHERE center_capacity > 1000;
SELECT supply_name, supply_quantity, supply_type FROM supplies WHERE supply_quantity < 50;
SELECT donation_id, donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donor_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT center_name, center_location FROM distribution_centers WHERE center_capacity > 100 ORDER BY center_capacity DESC;
SELECT supply_name, supply_quantity, supply_type FROM supplies WHERE supply_quantity > 50 AND supply_type = 'Medical' ORDER BY supply_quantity ASC;
SELECT donation_id, donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donor_name;
SELECT center_name, center_location, center_capacity FROM distribution_centers WHERE center_capacity < 50 ORDER BY center_capacity ASC, center_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM DonationRecords ORDER BY donor_name DESC;
SELECT supply_name, quantity FROM MedicalSupplies WHERE supply_type = 'Medicine';
SELECT center_name, location, contact_person FROM DistributionCenters WHERE location = 'CityA';
SELECT MAX(donation_amount) AS highest_donation FROM DonationRecords;
SELECT supply_name, quantity, center_name FROM DistributionRecords WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM DonationRecords WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date DESC
SELECT center_name, location, contact_person FROM DistributionCenters WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT supply_name, quantity FROM MedicalSupplies WHERE supply_type = 'Medicine' ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM DistributionRecords WHERE distribution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount, donation_date FROM DonationRecords WHERE donor_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT * FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date DESC, donation_amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT donor_id, donor_name FROM donors WHERE donor_id < 100 ORDER BY donor_id ASC;
SELECT donated_item, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000 ORDER BY donated_item DESC;
SELECT supply_name, supply_quantity FROM medical_supplies ORDER BY supply_quantity DESC;
SELECT distribution_date, center_name FROM distribution_records WHERE quantity_distributed > 50 ORDER BY distribution_date ASC
SELECT donor_name, donor_email FROM donors ORDER BY donor_name DESC;
SELECT donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000;
SELECT supply_name, supply_quantity FROM medical_supplies WHERE supply_quantity < 50 ORDER BY supply_quantity ASC;
SELECT d.donor_name, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donation FROM donors d JOIN donations do ON d.donor_id = do.donor_id GROUP BY d.donor_name ORDER BY total_donation DESC;

SELECT dr.distribution_date, m.supply_name, dc.center_name FROM distribution_records dr JOIN medical_supplies m ON dr.supply_id = m.supply_id JOIN distribution_centers dc ON dr.center_id = dc.center_id WHERE dr.quantity_distributed > 100 ORDER BY dr.distribution_date DESC;
